title: Laying Internal Shoulder Rotation
description: Standing Arm Twists / Rotations Browse all exercises Laying internal shoulder rotation is a at-home work out exercise that targets shoulders. Refer to the illustration diagram and instructions above for how to perform this exercise correctly. Double arm front raises, barbell clean and press / jerk / overhead press and standing arm twists / rotations are related exercise that target the same muscle groups as laying internal shoulder rotation. Visit our free illustrated exercise directory for more exercises to try in your workouts.
